Description: Iconix Brand Group agreed to pay $550,000 to settle charges that the company failed to produce certain documents before buying Rocawear, an acquisition requiring pre-merger review.

Iconix Brand Group, Inc. agreed to pay a $250,000 civil penalty to settle Federal Trade Commission charges that it violated the Children?s'Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and the FTC's COPPA Rule by knowingly collecting, using, or disclosing personal information from children online without first obtaining their parents' permission.
